General.Name: Development Investment Construction JSC
General.Description: Development Investment Construction Joint Stock Corporation invests in and develops urban areas and real estate projects in Vietnam. The company develops land, as well as apartment, hotel, and resort projects. It is also involved in the construction of industrial, civil, and technical projects, as well as infrastructures, industrial zones, transport and irrigation works, etc. In addition, the company manufactures and trades in construction materials and construction related items, such as fresh concrete, prefabricated concrete structures, construction stone, terrazzo tiles, block bricks, tuynel bricks, clay, ceramic tiles, granite tiles, etc., as well as trades in interior and exterior decoration products. Further, it imports and exports cement, limestone, wood pellets, rubber, gypsum, steel, round wood, and slag; and engages in house trading, real estate brokerage, real estate management, real estate services, property auction, investment consultancy, etc. Additionally, the company engages in mining, tourism, luxury hotel and resort, condotel, golf course, and logistics businesses. Development Investment Construction Joint Stock Corporation was founded in 1990 and is based in Vung Tau, Vietnam.
